name: Pick Me Pick Me
storyline: You and your friend are competing on the battlefield of LOVE to win over more than 20 AI-powered characters. Each of the characters is with their own personalities, passions, dreams, and even things they absolutely can’t stand. Do you have the charm, wit, and strategy to win them over? Outsmart your opponent by carefully choosing your responses and actions, flipping every scenario in your favor, and capturing the heart of your date! You can not select whom you are dating, the character is randomly assigned to each round, which means you can not trick your competitor. The more you know of each character, the more fun topics you can have.
summary: "Pick Me Pick Me" is an innovative 2-player online game that brings the chaos and hilarity of dating to the virtual world. Step into the Battlefield of Love, where you'll compete to use your creative ideas to have an engaging conversation with different characters powered by AI, showing your stylish outfits and taste, and placing strategic skill cards to win over your virtual partner and outshine your opponent.
